v.v: Bring me justice, God, and plead my cause against a nation that is not faithful.
For you are the God of my strength. Why have you rejected me?
Oh, send out your light and your truth, let them lead me.
Then I will go to the altar of God,
Why are you bowed down, my soul?

v: Why do I go about in mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
Let them bring me to your holy hill
I will praise you with the harp, God, my God.
Why are you upset within me?
Hope in God, for again I will praise him who is my salvation and my God.
